title: My music player has a better shuffle then ARAM
body: In the past 10 games in ARAM I've had nothing but jax and kayle. I don't see how this is Random. I would expect to see more of the other champions in my collection to make an appearance, and not see the same one over and over and over again. They should add an algorithm to prevent the same champ from appearing more than once every 3 or 4 games, cause this is getting rediculous.

replies.body: It's usually always like that. Some days you just get the same champs over and over. The best days are when it's Teemo.

Your music shuffle isn’t random. It’s “artificial randomness”. ARAM is truly random, so weird things like this happen.

Edit: aram SHOULD be truly random
